research.noResultsDesc: Please try adjusting your search terms or filters

damformer.title: DamFormer: A Transformer-based Neural Operator for Dam-break Flow Prediction
damformer.description: Proposed a Transformer-based neural operator DamFormer for predicting dam-break flows. This method can handle fluid dynamics problems under different geometric boundary conditions and achieve cross-geometric generalization capabilities.

rsModCubes.title: Design of Reconfigurable Robot System Based on Improved Modular Cubes
rsModCubes.description: Designed a reconfigurable robot system based on improved modular cubes with good reconfigurability and adaptability, capable of autonomously reconfiguring morphology according to task requirements.

whiskerSensorArray.title: Underwater Robot Environmental Perception System Based on Bionic Whisker Sensor Array
whiskerSensorArray.description: Developed an underwater robot environmental perception system based on bionic whisker sensor array, simulating the perception mechanism of fish lateral line system to improve underwater environmental perception capabilities.

whiskerSensor.title: Design and Optimization of High-Sensitivity Bionic Whisker Sensor
whiskerSensor.description: Designed a high-sensitivity bionic whisker sensor capable of detecting minute fluid disturbances, providing precise environmental perception capabilities for underwater robots.

sparseToDense.title: Transformer-based Sparse-to-Dense Flow Field Reconstruction Method
sparseToDense.description: Proposed a Transformer-based method for reconstructing dense flow fields from sparse sensor data, capable of reconstructing complete flow field information from limited sensor data.

underwaterNavigation.title: Underwater Navigation Device and Method Based on Bionic Perception
underwaterNavigation.description: This invention discloses an underwater navigation device and method based on bionic perception, achieving precise underwater environmental perception and navigation by simulating fish lateral line systems.

vectorThruster.title: Vector Thruster and Its Control Method
vectorThruster.description: This invention relates to a vector thruster and its control method, capable of achieving omnidirectional thrust control and improving the maneuverability of underwater robots.

undulatingFin.title: Bionic Undulating Fin Propulsion Device
undulatingFin.description: This invention discloses a bionic undulating fin propulsion device that simulates fish swimming patterns to achieve efficient underwater propulsion.

flexibleFin.title: Flexible Bionic Fin and Its Drive System
flexibleFin.description: This invention relates to a flexible bionic fin and its drive system, achieving bionic swimming propulsion through flexible materials and intelligent actuation.

smartShip.title: Intelligent Ship Autonomous Navigation System
smartShip.description: This invention discloses an intelligent ship autonomous navigation system that integrates multiple sensors and intelligent algorithms to achieve autonomous navigation and obstacle avoidance for ships.

mobileBuoy.title: Mobile Marine Buoy
mobileBuoy.description: This design relates to a mobile marine buoy with good stability and maneuverability, suitable for marine environment monitoring.

internetPlusGold.title: Gold Award in the 9th China International \"Internet+\" College Students Innovation and Entrepreneurship Competition
internetPlusGold.description: Won the gold award in the 9th China International \"Internet+\" College Students Innovation and Entrepreneurship Competition with the \"Bionic Perception Underwater Robot\" project, demonstrating innovation capabilities in underwater robotics technology.

roboticsCompetition.title: First Prize in National College Student Robotics Competition
roboticsCompetition.description: Won first prize in the National College Student Robotics Competition, demonstrating excellent skills in robot design and control.

mechanicalInnovation.title: Bronze Award in National College Student Mechanical Innovation Design Competition
mechanicalInnovation.organization: Mechanical Engineering Teaching Steering Committee of Higher Education Institutions, Ministry of Education
mechanicalInnovation.description: Won bronze award in the National College Student Mechanical Innovation Design Competition, reflecting capabilities in mechanical innovation design.

provincialMechanical.title: Bronze Award in Liaoning Province College Student Mechanical Innovation Design Competition
provincialMechanical.description: Won bronze award in the Liaoning Province College Student Mechanical Innovation Design Competition, demonstrating talent in mechanical design innovation.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Showcasing my project achievements in scientific computing, robotics, and software development
projects.noResultsDesc: Please try adjusting your search criteria or filters

damformer.title: DamFormer: Transformer-based Dam-break Flow Prediction
damformer.description: Innovatively applying Transformer architecture to computational fluid dynamics, achieving cross-geometric generalization prediction of dam-break flows. This project significantly improves computational efficiency while maintaining high accuracy, providing new solutions for fluid dynamics numerical simulation.

highlights.crossGeometric: First application of Transformer architecture to dam-break flow prediction
highlights.published: Achieved cross-geometric boundary generalization prediction capability
highlights.architecture: Improved computational efficiency by over 100x compared to traditional methods
highlights.dataset: Achieved state-of-the-art performance on multiple benchmark tests

sparseToDense.title: Sparse-to-Dense Flow Field Reconstruction
sparseToDense.description: Transformer-based neural operator for high-precision reconstruction from sparse sensor data to dense flow fields, providing new technical pathways for fluid monitoring and prediction.

highlights.sparseReconstruction: Achieved dense flow field reconstruction from sparse sensor data
highlights.highAccuracy: Achieved high accuracy in various flow field reconstruction tasks
highlights.realTimeProcessing: Supports real-time flow field reconstruction and prediction

bionicRobot.title: Bionic Perception Underwater Robot System
bionicRobot.description: Based on fish lateral line system principles, designed and implemented intelligent underwater robots with environmental perception capabilities. The system can detect water flow changes and obstacle positions in real-time, providing new technical solutions for underwater operations.

highlights.bionicPerception: Simulated fish lateral line system bionic perception mechanism
highlights.realTimeDetection: Achieved real-time water flow change detection
highlights.complexEnvironment: Validated effectiveness in complex water environments

fanWall.title: Fan Array Experimental Platform
fanWall.description: Designed and built a modular fan array experimental platform for flow control and turbulence research. The platform features high configurability and precise control capabilities, providing powerful tools for fluid mechanics experiments.

highlights.pwmTach: PWM speed control and tachometer feedback

marineBuoy.title: Marine Observation Buoy
marineBuoy.description: Designed the mechanical structure of a marine observation buoy with excellent sealing and corrosion resistance, capable of stable long-term operation in harsh marine environments, providing reliable observation platforms for marine scientific research.

highlights.structureSealing: Optimized structural sealing and anti-corrosion design
highlights.buoyancyCalculation: Precise buoyancy calculation and stability analysis

serverHpc.title: High Performance Computing Server Cluster
serverHpc.description: Built and maintained high-performance computing server clusters supporting large-scale deep learning training and scientific computing tasks. The cluster features efficient resource scheduling and task management capabilities, providing powerful computational support for research work.

about.title: About Me
about.description: Learn about my academic background, research interests, and professional experience
about.introduction: I am Zhaoyang Mu, currently focused on interdisciplinary research in computational fluid dynamics, robotics, and artificial intelligence. My research interests include neural operators, deep learning applications in scientific computing, and bionic robot system design.

master.description: Focused on computational fluid dynamics and marine engineering numerical simulation research

bachelor.description: Gained solid engineering foundation and mechanical design capabilities

interests.title: Research Interests
items: Neural operator applications in scientific computing
Transformer architecture applications in physics problems
Efficient solutions for fluid-structure interaction problems
Integration of artificial intelligence and traditional engineering
